formatDescription: Gmn files are used within Garmin Forerunner watches, which track GPS and heart rate data when work by the user during exercise. Gmn files store data relating to the exercise session, which can include heart rate, altitude, timestamp and position (latitude and longitude).
provenanceCompoundName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives

internalSignatures.name: Garmin track log file
internalSignatures.note: BOF Absolute from beginning of file, magic bytes: <@gArMiN@>
